Replace.Text: 马转化为金币
Convert Horses to Gold
花费100 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力将30个 [ICON_RESOURCE_HORSES] 马转化为200 [ICON_GOLD] 金币。 由商业中心区的第一级建筑解锁。
Spends 100 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and converts 30 [ICON_RESOURCE_HORSES] Horses into 200 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Requires Commercial Hubs District Tier 1 building to unlock.
铁转化为金币
Convert Iron to Gold
花费200 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力将30个 [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] 铁转化为400 [ICON_GOLD] 金币。由商业中心区的第一级建筑解锁。
Spends 200 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and converts 30 [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] Iron into 400 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Requires Commercial Hubs District Tier 1 building to unlock.
硝石转化为金币
Convert Niter to Gold
花费300 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力将30个 [ICON_RESOURCE_NITER] 硝石转化为600 [ICON_GOLD] 金币。由商业中心区的第二级建筑解锁。
Spends 300 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and converts 30 [ICON_RESOURCE_NITER] Niter into 600 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Requires Commercial Hubs District Tier 2 building to unlock.
煤转化为金币
Convert Coal to Gold
花费400 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力将30个 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] 煤转化为800 [ICON_GOLD] 金币。由商业中心区的第二级建筑解锁。
Spends 400 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and converts 30 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] Coal into 800 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Requires Commercial Hubs District Tier 2 building to unlock.
石油转化为金币
Convert Oil to Gold
花费500 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力将30个 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] 石油转化为1000 [ICON_GOLD] 金币。由商业中心区的第三级建筑解锁。
Spends 500 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and converts 30 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil into 1000 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Requires Commercial Hubs District Tier 3 building to unlock.
铝转化为金币
Convert Aluminum to Gold
花费600 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力将30个 [ICON_RESOURCE_ALUMINUM] 铝转化为1200 [ICON_GOLD] 金币。由商业中心区的第三级建筑解锁。
Spends 600 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and converts 30 [ICON_RESOURCE_ALUMINUM] Aluminum into 1200 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Requires Commercial Hubs District Tier 3 building to unlock.
铀转化为金币
Convert Uranium to Gold
花费700 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力将30个 [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] 铀转化为1400 [ICON_GOLD] 金币。由商业中心区的第四级建筑解锁。
Spends 700 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and converts 30 [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] Uranium into 1400 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Requires Commercial Hubs District Tier 4 building to unlock.
